mapper.insert: insert into car_locale_auction ( id, code, title, station_real_id region_id, city_id, poster, address, gps_longitude, gps_latitude, start_time, corporate_agent, status, see_car_man, see_car_time, see_car_phone, create_person, create_time, modify_person, modify_time, del_person, del_time, del_flag ) values ( #{id}, #{code}, #{title}, #{stationRealId} #{regionId}, #{cityId}, #{poster}, #{address}, #{gpsLongitude}, #{gpsLatitude}, #{startTime}, #{corporateAgent}, #{status}, #{seeCarMan}, #{seeCarTime}, #{seeCarPhone}, #{createPerson}, #{createTime}, #{modifyPerson}, #{modifyTime}, #{delPerson}, #{delTime}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update:

where id = #{id}
